website_summaries.verdict: A small, short- to mid-wavelength infrared lamp that is easy to use and adjust.
pros: This compact infrared lamp is a good choice for people who need a smaller lamp to focus on certain areas of the body
The 300W bulb heats up quickly and has a 15-minute overheat shutoff
The ceramic glass keeps the heat evenly focused, and adjusting the device is easy
cons: Some customers report that their lamps stopped working after several months, and replacement bulbs are expensive

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: As a European who moved to North America I was surprised how difficult it was to find infrared heat lamps. In Germany these lamps are very common and used to help with head colds and muscle pain. It took me some time to find a suitable product that was comparable to what I was used to. The Beurer IL 50 meets my expectations fully. The 300 Watts deliver pleasant heat, the product stands reliably and stable and the angle is easy to adjust. The timer is helpful as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jelo

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product, nearly burned down my house!
customer_reviews.text: By bad design or defect, this comes on when it is plugged in, no need to switch it on. I didn't realize this when I first used it, and then was cleaning up and set it in a chair. We had a 30-second power outage. A few minutes later, when I smelled smoke I turned and saw my chair smoking and quickly unplugged the device that had turned itself on because of a power outage! It ruined a $1200 leather chair and would have burned my house down if I hadn't caught it! Unbelievable that a product that generates so much heat doesn't failsafe to off when powered up, and all should be recalled.
customer_reviews.author: Dale L. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Helps muscle aches, sore throats, acne & sinuses
customer_reviews.text: Great for muscle aches, sore throats, sinus issues & acne. Very helpful. The only reason for 4 stars, is that it is hard to get into position for my knee problems. You have to really get creative w/ positioning. My son loves it for acne, but be sure the wear tanning booth googles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is just perfect for heating up individual body parts before I use my fascia blaster.
customer_reviews.author: mdurdle

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Bulb was dead upon opening this item. I read reviews of people this happened to, including the expensive shipping to fix and return, but hoped for the best and unfortunately never got to use. Luckily found a dual infrared/red light that is more expensive but works amazingly. Only takes 1 minute per area and is called the LZR Ultrabright.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Infrared Therapy will change your life
customer_reviews.text: This product has helped my chronic low back pain better than any other therapy I have used, including pain pills, massage, or exercise. Because of the relief I get, I am now able to take yoga classes, which is making me even more flexible and healthy. Haven’t felt this good in 15 years. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is because the first unit I received had a bad bulb. I returned to Amazon, and received my second unit 2 days after I requested a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: kentamine1

customer_reviews.title: The quality and effect are very good
customer_reviews.text: The quality and effect of the product is very good. I bought it because of a sprained ankle and used it for more than half a month. It is very helpful for rehabilitation. After more than a week of pain in the waist, the pain gradually subsided
customer_reviews.author: evafok

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Item was dead on arrival, I guess I got unlucky but want I wanted to put a review out there. The box was tapped up and there were fingerprints on the glass, and aside from that I think the bulb is broken.
customer_reviews.author: M.Jeung

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the light because I had a bad fall on treadmill in 2014. Fast forward to 2019, during an exam a doctor told me that my X-ray showed severe arthritis in my right foot ( no pain just tight and probably inflamed internally.) I think it’s gout (I’m a registered nurse) lol. Anyway, the light was delivered yesterday, I used it for 2 cycles in the morning and 2 cycles in the evening. I massaged my foot after the light treatment and I feel less tightness and I’m able to do standing toe raises. I am able to bend the foot like I did before the fall.
customer_reviews.author: Toye

customer_reviews.title: I bought it to help with chronic elbow pain. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to help with chronic elbow pain. I'm still in pain after using it daily for the past 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: kbravais

customer_reviews.title: Relief Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I have been dealing with tennis elbow for the past 5 months. I have tried acupuncture, scraping, cryotherapy - you name it! This is similar to the infrared heat that is used at the acupuncturist office. I use it every night and feel so relieved. I bought it for my elderly mother who has a real bad case of arthritis. She uses it on a daily basis and it provides her lots of relief. I have been telling everyone about it. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Health - made in Germany
customer_reviews.text: Due to the fact that I've known this company from Germany I ordered this Lamp when I was looking for infrared heat treatment. Beurer is famous for health protection and support and offers a lot of very helpful items. The lamp came in time and was well packed (without styrofoam but a very good recycable paper). We use it every day for our painful joints and enjoy the relaxing heat. Thank you, Beurer!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Sigl

customer_reviews.title: It almost burned.
customer_reviews.text: Automatically power must be turned off, but it will not turn off. It almost burned.
customer_reviews.author: sang p. Han

customer_reviews.title: Great for use with my fascia blaster!
customer_reviews.text: Love this heater!!! Use it in conjunction with fascia blasting!!!! Awesome find!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Lester

customer_reviews.title: Great product for beauty
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would help more for pain but I think it’s best used for fighting wrinkles and detox
customer_reviews.author: Oldsoul10*foxy11!

customer_reviews.title: Broken within a second
customer_reviews.text: We were really excited about this lamp and it was broken within a second of being switched on. The bulb seems to have blown. This is particularly disappointing because we opened it outside of its return window and are now stuck with a defective lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Lippincott

customer_reviews.title: but I kept reading the reviews and decided it would be great for my aunt (76 years old)
customer_reviews.text: It took a long time for me to purchase this product, but I kept reading the reviews and decided it would be great for my aunt (76 years old). She's an usher at church and stands for long periods of time and started to complain about her knee bothering her. Once she started using the Beurer heat lamp she can't stop raving about it. She's even telling her family and friends about the product. Definitely worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Madelin D.

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this heat lamp. It works great for heating me up and keeping me hot for my Fascia Restoration using the fascia blaster by Ashley Black.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Person

customer_reviews.title: Concerned over the Marketing of this device
customer_reviews.text: Okay so first things first this is a infrared heat lamp marketed as a clinically superior Infrared Lamp with benefits that of an LED infrared lamp. For those curious as to the white light coming from within the device...its a Hallogen Light with a Red Filter. Not too dissimilar to a Red Heat Bulb. I wish it was more clear as to ehat this companies intentions were with the lamo itself. I do not get the feeling of infrared on my body, I more or less only feel the heat. There is no True clinical data based around this device that I can find. Correct me if I'm wrong Beurer.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile
customer_reviews.text: It’s lightwight, covers a large area. It’s effects are felt in areas of lung, sinuses, hands knees, neck and lower back. I got it to treat quite a few areas, remembering that I used an infrared light in my youth. For the price it is a good item. I do recommend it for good cellular, muscular and joint pain relief.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Holohan

customer_reviews.title: The lamp is very sturdy, and it is easy to direct light to ...
customer_reviews.text: My son purchased the Beurer Infrared Lamp for me after I had hip arthroscopy repair surgery. The Beuer Iinfrared lamp provides relief from my hip stiffness, back, knee pain and tension. The lamp is very sturdy, and it is easy to direct light to affected areas. As a cell biologist, I know that light therapies are often used in in vivo tissue culture procedures and studies. Furthermore, light therapy receives increasing interest in the fields of tissue regeneration and wound healing in vitro-- in real life.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: The product works for many things...
customer_reviews.text: I received it beginning of December and was excited to use it. It worked well for many days. After two weeks stopped working. The next day started working again. Unfortunately two days ago stopped working. No red light, no timer, nothing. This product works but has to be the right one. I didn’t ask for a replacement. I’m going to do some research before buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Therapy Lamp
customer_reviews.text: The Therapy Lamp is a home doctor and beautician. Recently, I took up physical exercises to lose weight. My belly skin sagged. Daily warming of the skin on the abdomen for only 15 minutes helps to tone the skin. The skin becomes smooth and subcutaneous fat leaves faster. I highly recommend to anyone who wants to lose weight and be in a beautiful body. In addition, for those who have skin problems: acne, acne, this device will also help bring your skin in order. Great quality and good price! Photo before and after 2 weeks of using the lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Larisa

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: We love our infrared light. It helps with sore joints, earaches, shingles, and acne. I don't know how we did without it for so many years!
customer_reviews.author: Susan A. Ogan

customer_reviews.title: Lamp is dead after little use
customer_reviews.text: This lamp stopped working after few times of use. The lamp inside is dead. Fan turns on and timer turns on but no heat or light. Very disappointed. Obviously Beurer will not read this review snd will not do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Andreas

customer_reviews.title: Has helped for back pain.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this almost daily set at 15 minutes for back and leg pain. It really helps! I’ve had no problems with it at all. I’m thinking of getting another one so I can cover more of my body. Works really well. Red light therapy was recommended by my MD who is helping me with my Chronic Fatigue Syndrome.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A.

customer_reviews.title: just wow
customer_reviews.text: i got this to help with my knee pain and then started using it on my face. it's the best red light i've ever used. i've used it at least 50 times and it still works as it should.
customer_reviews.author: ashley denae

customer_reviews.title: I love this warm, soothing, comforting light so much!
customer_reviews.text: But why does it move, and re-adjust on its own ? (See photos) I like it down, as I use it for my feet; but always it slowly tilts upwards (which is frustrating b/c I don't want it to move, also being completely paranoid about the bulb burning out!)
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: A good product.
customer_reviews.text: I've used it now for neck pain, low back weakness and sinus problems. I've found it both easy to use and to work well. The area covered is quite large which is convenient. Heat is plenty, but not overwhelming. Overall an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Minagpa

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I really like this so far. I am using it to try to jelp heal my thyroiditis and lower back pain. They say it helps to heal a cold faster, I haven't tried it for that yet. It is made well, very simple to use. It is supposed to penetrate deeper than just regular heat because it's infrared. Easy to use, and I feel better after using it.
customer_reviews.author: ChristineArtist

customer_reviews.title: I love lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I use this every night after a soothing shower. It puts me right to sleep. If I wake up in the middle of the night I just switch it back on and fall right back asleep. Very pleased for the quality and price
customer_reviews.author: JessicaTsc

customer_reviews.title: Pain free, pill free living!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a frozen shoulder for years, and with one 15 minute session, the pain was reduced dramatically. You can feel the healing process and the benefits of increased circulation. Although the heat feels simular to a heat dish or ceramic heater, the benefits are beyond anything I've tried. A dramatic improvement in sleep quality and a reduction to muscle pain in just one session. Got 3 more right after.
customer_reviews.author: Kaoann

customer_reviews.title: Want to feel & look better? - buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I practice Asian Medicine & cant do moxibustion in my office. Instead I put this for 15 minutes on my clients feet and almost every one has gone home & purchased one for themselves. Talk about a feel good piece of equipment!
customer_reviews.author: amy meeker

customer_reviews.title: Beurer Infrared Heat Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this lamp as a therapy for my husband, who is an amputee, to use on his leg. He states that it seems to help. We have only had this machine for just a couple of days. I am also glad to have it for other needs that may arise this winter such as colds and flu. I am planning on further research into how infrared light therapy is used in Europe.
customer_reviews.author: HopeF.

customer_reviews.title: Well designed, built with quality materials, & works perfectly out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well designed lamp that seems to be constructed with quality materials & it works as advertised. It seems to warm the body & increase circulation to the parts exposed as directed. That is bound to increase healing & help restore function. It promotes relaxation & a pleasant feeling, especially prior to sleep. I am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. E. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Packs a Punch!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for muscle relief, on my sons acne, and most recently to relieve sinus pressure from a cold. Incredible results! I had no idea it would help with my cold—but within ten minutes I felt significantly better. I couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: CMWoolner

customer_reviews.title: Great for healing wounds
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as prescribed by my Dr. To speed up the healing of a wound. It really worked. I love it and it is compact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Timer limitations, 90° minimum head tilt angle to horizontal,
customer_reviews.text: Timer only allows maximum of 15min per each time of use. It shuts off after 15min and so I need to turn it back on again. 300watts is perfect for the intensity I need. Head cannot tilt downward at all. Lowest position of light pathway is 90 degrees to the horizontal. Can tilt skyward. Vents light up while it's in use,fully illuminating entire machine.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Wakefield

customer_reviews.title: It's a time machine
customer_reviews.text: I swear I am going back in time, or at least my face is! Only had it a week, scars are lightening, skin is softening, color is blooming!!! I love it. I wish they had a giant one so I could get my whole body!
customer_reviews.author: BarbCF

customer_reviews.title: RLT eases pain
customer_reviews.text: This product is lightweight and easy to use. My husband and I both have joint pain, neck and shoulder pain, and I suffer from headaches. We have not had it very long, but so far results have been great. The heat from the red light feels wonderful! The pain in our joints has eased considerably. I also have osteopenia in my hip and it helps with that pain also. We checked with our doctor and he said there are many benefits from using RLT, and we can use it whenever we want. There are no side effects either. We will continue to enjoy the benefits of RLT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy to have purchased this lamp and will use it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic neck, shoulder, back and sciatica problem. Several days ago when I was suffering from sciatica pain, I used the lamp for 30 mins. After that the pain went away and the next day I did have any pain. However, due to the sedantary nature of my job, I am in front of the compter for at least 15 hours per day, therefore the pain often will come back if I do not stretch. I found that the lamp would help me every time when I have any neck, back or sciatica pain. I am very happy to have purchased this lamp and will use it daily to relieve my back and neck pain.
customer_reviews.author: mc818

customer_reviews.title: I need to get it back to treat my poor back muscles
customer_reviews.text: Infrared light therapy is not as known in America as in Europe. I purchased the exact same one as my Mom in Germany told me about and my son borrowed it for his sinus problems. I need to get it back to treat my poor back muscles. It makes a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: EvaRu

customer_reviews.title: Very handy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for myself and have highly enjoyed the relief I have gotten when using it. It is the perfect size and so easy to set up anywhere. I love the timer feature; it is extremely convenient. The price has dropped since my purchase and I can tell you that you will not be disappointed! I have even used this on my 15 year old chihuahua who has arthritis and kidney issues. She absolutely loves her time sitting in my lap getting her turn with this great machine!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: So soothing
customer_reviews.text: I use this for pain and it is so wonderfully soothing. It also has visibly improved the skin on my face and chest. I am most grateful for it because (thought not advertised for this) I read this kind of light can improve skin ulcers and wounds. My mom went through months of suffering from ulcers on her ankle. She went to 6 different specialists and endured painful debriding with no relief. She tried the lamp twice a day and it cleared up in less than 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Double chen

customer_reviews.title: Best treatment for those with sinus troubles
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help a sore knee and I read the reviews and saw that it can be used for sinus problems. I have been using the infrared heater daily for my sinuses- I cannot believe how much it helps me! I do not have to take an antihistamine daily anymore as the infrared heat clears up my sinuses. This product is so wonderful! I am so glad I found out about it!
customer_reviews.author: mermaidseas

customer_reviews.title: Neck Pain relief, finally
customer_reviews.text: I almost bought one of the $200 infrared heating pads on here after my cheap CVS one broke, but decided to try this first. I am so glad that I did. I suffer form horrific chronic neck pain caused by “tech neck” and this is incredible. After two 15 minute sessions this has given me more relief than any other device or treatment I have tried over 10+ years. Foam rollers, constant icing, theracane, patches, CBD rubs, or cervical traction devices all seem like a waste of time now. So happy I decided to try this; life changing, will be using daily.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Janky infrared light therapy lamp
customer_reviews.text: After having used this product for a mere nine months, the infrared light blew out and it completely stopped working. So yes, it did its job while I was using it, but now it doesn't work and none of the parts can be replaced! No wonder why we live in a world filled with trash; if electronic items stop working after a few months what other options do we have but to dump them? This isn't something that can be recycled or reused in any way. Because I'm trying to be environmentally conscious this piece of crap is just going to sit in my room and take up space for nothing. Thanks a lot Beurer! How environmentally friendly!
customer_reviews.author: Edith Undo

customer_reviews.title: Functions well. Does NOT come with eye-protection.
customer_reviews.text: This unit burns very hot. Surprisingly hot but it works well and is easy to figure out how to use right away. The only downfall is that it did NOT come with protective eyewear that is included in the picture. The description does not include eyewear but the picture does so make sure you understand it does NOT come with eye protection. Works great though.
customer_reviews.author: Chansen

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I had severe neck pain and shoulder pain, 15 mins and the pain is gone, when the pain comes back i sit another 15 mins,i was skeptical at first but it really does penetrate to deep muscles. Highly recommend this. Its way better than a heating pad.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna

customer_reviews.title: Works for multiple fracture on femur.. saving chiropractors!
customer_reviews.text: I have a compound multiple fracture on my legs and due to the infrared the pain from rheumatism and from the pins have subsided. It is definitely a blessing that Beurer has this product in the market. It works. Depending on how long you use is also a determinant.
customer_reviews.author: logicalapproach

customer_reviews.title: really work!
customer_reviews.text: Just heard about infrared light from a friend who calls it "magic lamp". I didn't know this kind of lamp has been in the market for more than 10 years! After doing some research, I'm glad I've pick this product. Short to medium wave length, 300w power and affordable price, all of these meet my requirements. The first time use already satisfy me and my husband. Back pain, muscle pain got relieved. Highly recommend! Now I've had this for over a month, and I don't use it everyday. Hopefully the bulb can last long.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: CAN'T BELIEVE I can't believe I have not been aware ...
customer_reviews.text: CAN'T BELIEVE I can't believe I have not been aware of this amazingly effective "infra red" light. The value of the increased circulation alone is enough to justify the purchase. I will write another review when I've had it longer. Thank you Amazon for making this available!
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Mountain Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Screen is large with handles for easy maneuver
customer_reviews.text: I just got it today and so far I absolutely love it! The timer is set at a default of 15 minutes and you can decrease the time if you desire. I currently have some eczema that I am wanting to clear up so I am working on the emotional cause (inside) while treating the outside with the infrared. I have read amazing things with infrared light so excited to see results. Will follow up in the next few weeks. Stay tuned.
customer_reviews.author: ASK

customer_reviews.title: I was really disappointed with this item
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed with this item. Apparently, this item was defective. The infrared light was not lit and did not generate any heat. I am working with Amazon on a replacement and have yet to give it a review but as of now, I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for arthritis pain management and chest congestion
customer_reviews.text: I have a torn meniscus and knee arthritis and this is so effective, one session is as effective for pain as a dose of ibuprofen. So you can reduce how much pain medicine you take based on how much relief you get. It is also great for pneumonia, bronchitis, cold and flu. Gives temporary relief from congestion and body pain. Also great for back pain, that's totally gone now. I've had a for a few years and still going strong. Gentle enough for kids too.
customer_reviews.author: N. M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I have had frozen shoulder before in my left arm, now 2 years later my right arm is starting to feel the same pains, knowing what was going on I bought this because the red light helped me get through the last episode when I was seeing doctor every week. Of course this isn't same strength but can definitely feel it working!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful& portable. Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Seems to really help my achy joints. I have arthritis and especially on damp days I like using this little heat lamp. It has a timer and it isn't so strong that it burns. It seems powerful enough to give relief but not too hot. For under $50 it was a good buy. I recommend this heat lamp.
customer_reviews.author: E. Constable

customer_reviews.title: Great product and nice design
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite purchases. Great in the winter when you need a quick warm up on skin surface, especially if you have low blood pressure. I like the handles and it is a nice size.
customer_reviews.author: Partner4Care

customer_reviews.title: Works fast
customer_reviews.text: Amazing therapy. And works fast with heat. Now sure if the infrared light is what gives the benefit, but it feels like the heat penetrates into deep tissues, releaving the pain. Solid construction and self standing it’s a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Chaya Lara Vartikovskaia. Health advisor, Mentor, Emotion Healing Counseling.

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed so far
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Red Light Therapy before, and have had success with a less expensive lamp version that I purchased here on Amazon. That one does not give off much heat, but I feel the positive effects the next day. This one does nothing other than to heat up your muscles. Also, it smells like something is burning every time I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can't use it without my dog stealing the light!
customer_reviews.text: This works wonders on our muscles, only problem is our Chihuahua loves it so much we can't use it without her coming between us and the light lol. It helps our muscles relax in the back and shoulders but also helps breath better when my chest is tight.
customer_reviews.author: John III

customer_reviews.title: Started Couch Fire!!!
customer_reviews.text: First the low rating is because of the negligent program engineering of the device, which started a fire in the middle of the night. By the grace of God it wasn’t a catastrophe. That being said, The device adds tremendous value to personal health and wellness.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLA

customer_reviews.title: Target painful areas easily
customer_reviews.text: This is the best little machine I've purchased in awhile! It's easy to adjust to target certain body parts. The unit does get hot which is why you only can go 15 minutes. I've read that's plenty of time to reap the near IR light therapy benefits. Feels so much more stable than those light box styles. I've only been using a week. Don't see a huge pain difference, but will continue as it's very relaxing!
customer_reviews.author: oz67401

customer_reviews.title: This is a fine and well made unit
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine and well made unit, which can be used for larger and smaller area alike for pain management. The timer helps a lot, that way one does not have to remember to shut off. For therapeutic purposes 15 minutes increments is a best recommended time. It is a good looking and very practical unit, with a good portability and easy storage. Buy with confidence, if pain management and cold therapy is to be addressed.
customer_reviews.author: Sam  Sharma

customer_reviews.title: works well, happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and provides quick inflammation relief for me. I bought it to use on my sinuses but I also tried it on an old knee injury and within a few days noticed a definite improvement. Much more reasonably priced than other IR lamps and its strong. It does get very hot so keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: jennyo

customer_reviews.title: Finally ear ache relief!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for lower back pain and osteoarthritis in the knees and it had definitely helped ease pain! The best thing I am experiencing is relief from an ear ache that has been bothering me for over five years. I wish I would have found this product earlier in time. My partner loves that it’s relaxing and warming.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: It is worth a try and it adds value
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses 2x weekly. He is active in jui-jitsu 2x a week, walks 2 miles a day and various hours if road time shuttling our kids ( sitting long times is hard on your back) It is a good item to deeply penetrate sleg, knee, shoulder and back muscles. Not a complete cure all but a great tool to alternate out use of heating pads and ibproferin.
customer_reviews.author: MomWarEagle

customer_reviews.title: Seems helpful but i got a third degree burn off it!
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea if it's actual infrared or just a heat lamp but feels great. Be careful tho- I got a tiny third degree burn when my knee brushed against it!
customer_reviews.author: Annony Mouse

customer_reviews.title: Pain Aid indeed
customer_reviews.text: Dear Beurer,I purchased your product Beurer IL50 Infrared Light Therapy, Heating Lamp, Red Light Heat Device (Portable), Near IR Cold Laser| for Muscle Pain & Pain Relief as I have several health issues that causes pain.I only used the device once, but I must say it does make a difference as I’m not hurting as I was. I plan to use it more to really see the full effects on what the device can do. Thank you for designing product that aid people like us who desire to be pain free without surgery or drugs. Carlise B.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered 3 of these lamps in the last 4 months, giving two as gifts, and found product to be well made and handy. My wife has arthritis in her feet and places adjustable light therapy heating lamp on kitchen floor while she is working or when sitting at desk working and feels instant relief. Last lamp ordered arrived broken but Amazon has arranged for new one to be shipped to us. Great product and great service. Thank you, Rick
customer_reviews.author: Rick Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I use it for acne and when I have a cold or sinus infection. I think it has helped a lot clearing infections in the skin and sinuses. I would definitely recommend this product. My mother has used infrared light for years on her skin and with her patients as well. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana

customer_reviews.title: love this for my face and neck!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for the infrared benefits for skin/ anti-aging. Its too soon to tell if I look any younger (!), but I absolutely love the way it feels and I use the 15 min time to meditate. Easy to use, love that it adjusts up/down, and small enough to tuck away when cooled. Bought one for 2 of my sisters as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: I decided to try it and I'm glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product as an alternative to other medical treatments my physician suggested. After ruling out other injuries I have had persistent pain in my lower back/side area. Infrared heat is being used in Europe as a standard treatment for soft tissue issues and other therapeutic healing. I decided to try it and I'm glad I did. It's a great product and I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: franca

customer_reviews.title: Good for sinus headaches !
customer_reviews.text: I have been having sinus headaches for the past few weeks and doing this a few times a day really is helpful. I've also used it for back pain, it's great! I definitely recommend it, and it looks very cool too.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Modica

customer_reviews.title: Excruciating pain reliever within 3-5 minutes. Works every time!
customer_reviews.text: This device is a must have for severe pain. I have severe Piriformis muscle pain. When I have difficulty standing, I position the monitor on my buttock for 3-5 minutes, and the pain goes away. I use this device or my infered mat. Both are AMAZING! The only issue with this moniter is that it get extremely hot, and if is fall on your skin, you will get burned. If you are careful, this device will relieve pain the fastest.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. H.

customer_reviews.title: Heat Lamp built in China
customer_reviews.text: DId not work when we got it out of the box. Warning. do not buy this product from China. BLR
customer_reviews.author: Brudat

customer_reviews.title: This will be part of my daily routine.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this unit and used it and got relief from foot pain. Very hopeful about using it on other areas of pain. The heat is relaxing and soothing. Plan on telling friends and family about Beurer products.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Glorified lightbulb
customer_reviews.text: This did nothing to help post surgical pain or scar tissue. I don't believe it penetrates through the skin at all, very superficial heat source. If it did penetrate the skin it should have helped to minimize the formation of scar tissue below and at skin level. If you find relief from this light it is either just the heat on the skin like a heating pad, or placebo effect.
customer_reviews.author: Roscoe

customer_reviews.title: I think this is actually helping
customer_reviews.text: I love this little light, but it's little. I've been using it on a bum elbow & it's hard to know if the elbow is getting better because it was going to or because of the light. I do know that it's soothing, that it gets nice and warm but never too hot, and that the white noise can be quite pleasing. I also feel like my skin texture has improved along my neck and shoulder on that side which is a lovely side effect.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gottlieb

customer_reviews.title: Been using for almost 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Has helped me heal back pain, wrist and ankle injuries. I literally came on here to order another one because I can’t imagine if something happens to mine. I use it multiple times per week and it has been 2 years, so want a backup! Unfortunately, the price has increased by $27, so the backup will have to wait:(
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Good to have for knee or sprain recovery
customer_reviews.text: The IR is of good quality. The timer is a tad short to prevent burning. It does help in improving circulation for total recovery. One of my tools for knee injury. One of the best products in use I ever bought. I would recommend totally. Just a bit pricey but built well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hill

customer_reviews.title: WOW, This works!
customer_reviews.text: I have a torn rotator cuff so i checked the reviews for what ever they have to help me for the pain. Amazon web suite had this unit on sale so i figured i will give it a try. I used this twice a day and by the third day it had made a big difference. I was able to use my arm with a lot less pain. I I'm still using it once day and my shoulder has never felt better. Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: well built
customer_reviews.text: The size of the lamp is reasonable, and I cam place it on a table, on the floor or other small surface to treat different areas of my body. I did not buy a standing lamp because it is usually too big to store with extended legs. The handles are well built and it is easy and smooth to tilt the lamp at an angle. Overall, I would recommend this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I had been experincing lower back pain due to bulging disc for months. Prescriptions and Physical Therapy did not do what this Infrared Lamp has done for me. I was skeptical but it actually works and works well! The pain and stiffness has gone away after a few days of use. I spent hundreds of dollars on copays and this for a small price this lamp has been the best relief. This is a great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ducky44

customer_reviews.title: It works for me
customer_reviews.text: I used to always use a heating pad for back and knee pain. My Brother has a Breuer infrared light therapy and I loved it that, just have to order me one. I like the automatic shut off and make sure to follow the directions carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Perla

customer_reviews.title: Instant pain relief.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to find something for my back pain. I had back surgery in 2000 and haven’t had many issues. But as I age, my back gets sore. This worked beautifully!!! It’s so relaxing and I love the heat!!! I also use it on my face to help regenerate collagen along with my vitamin C serum. I don’t like taking meds to help with my back pain so I always research alternative therapy. I researched red light therapy benefits and I’m so glad I did!! Totally worth every penny! Timer function is perfect cause it has the auto shut off. Easy to use, just aim it where you want the pain relief and that’s it!! Excellent investment in my health!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work as described at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one due to the cheaper price compared to other similar products. It does work as described and produce enough warm getting deep to my muscle. You can only do 30 min max each time because the unit will get very hot and the instructions state the unit needs to cool down after use. I also wish it is like other lamp style so I can adjust the angle better to face down Instead of facing forward (since I can't really look at it). Now the unit position is pretty fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Nang K. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Give it time
customer_reviews.text: I injured my knee in January. I tried over the counter pain medication, knee brace, therapy with no relief. I started using beurer infrared heat lamp and it has significantly reduced the pain. I use the lamp twice a day. I am back to squats, lunges, burpees, bear crawls, etc.
customer_reviews.author: KARI DELISLE

customer_reviews.title: awesome must buy
customer_reviews.text: Love it worked great i read red light therapy can whiten teeth too so smile during red light therapy 😀 awesome. I've been using this everyday my face looks awesome must buy
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I close my eyes and it feels like I'm at the beach! ... in Rhode Island in the middle of February. A girl's gotta dream and this sure helps paradise seem that much closer. It helps soften and heal my skin while also giving me some energy that's drained from the seasonal depression and lack of sunlight. I highly recommend this to anyone having similar issues! :)
customer_reviews.author: camerarobcf

customer_reviews.title: It's been really helpful for my constant back pain.
customer_reviews.text: I've been having a sudden and agonizing back pain from time to time, until I found this product. I've been researching about the solution for my constant back pain, and I found out that heat can actually relief your pain. Therefore, I'd started looking for a heater that can help me with my problem. As a result, I'd came across this product on Amazon, and it was a game changer for me. It's simple to operate, and you can position it however you want. Also, the heat itself is great and consistent. I would definitely recommend this product because it does what it supposes to do, and it's great at it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken now from falling on floor 😔
customer_reviews.text: Wish they put a non slip pad underneath 😔 two days after return window this slid off a table oof 😣 I’ll contact customer service 😔 see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Nice Alternative Health Option
customer_reviews.text: Similar results I received during laser treatments at my Rheumatologist office. The infrared heat penetrates deeper into tissue layers and definitely is a key at home treatment for my ailments from sports injuries. Especially helpful during winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Tambuku

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Great design, easy to use, with great results. I use for a variety of reasons, but have had unbelievable luck with a tooth infection. I hadn't planned to use it for that, but when my gums under the infection started hurting I figured it would be worth a try? I had results the first time and it continues that way everytime! Now when I just barely feel the infection flaring up I go straight to the lamp! Helps a lot with back pain I have suffered from for years, as well as a rash I had on my back! I even think I sleep better after the days I use it!?! Thank you Beurer for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: PJ Killion

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great Product that I use for my sore back, neck, hands, arms, and feet from work and other accidents. Built great and can burn you if get too close. I was looking something that therapist and doctors may use. This is a great product to buy
customer_reviews.author: LNR Production Studio

customer_reviews.title: I am expecting good results after reading the reviews
customer_reviews.text: Just received two days ago. Have used it 4 times but now decided I have not adjusted distance properly. I am expecting good results after reading the reviews. I want to use for sciatica and arthritis and sinus when needed. The manual gave instructions for care and proper setup, cleaning, etc. but not much info on what physical conditions it could/should help. I read all the reviews and they were helpful. On the website it states for colds but not much more. Is there some additional information available? I feel it will work fine. It arrived quickly and in working condition
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually really impressed with this. I was skeptical about if it would actually help my pain. I have severe, all over, chronic pain from a connective tissue disorder and fibromyalgia and this light actually helps my pain. I use it with other forms of pain relief, but it definitely helps more than I thought it would. I even used it when I was sick and congested and it helped relieve the sinus pressure and discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Carley

customer_reviews.title: Great Performance and Design!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Beurer IL50 Infrared Heat Lamp to help soothe muscle pains as well as to clear my sinuses. I am very pleased with the performance and design of this product. This heating lamp is far superior to previous lamps I've used in the past. Looking forward to many years of relief thanks to the Beurer IL50 Heat Lamp. I highly recommend this lamp!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Florek

customer_reviews.title: Really helps reducing pains
customer_reviews.text: I sprang my ankle a couple of months ago, and then my wife sprang hers last Saturday...My ankle is almost recovered but still stiff. So I bought this to help recovery. It just took several treatments for us to feel a relief. I would like to recommend it to anybody who want to relief the pain caused by springing.
customer_reviews.author: Alec

customer_reviews.title: So glad I purchased this infrared light!
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I get bronchitis (I get it chronically), I hold this above my chest for 15 minutes per night before bed. It usually gets me well in a week or two, when usually I have a wracking cough for three or four months. Love this light!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Lee

product_meta.title: Beurer IL50 Infrared Light Therapy, Heating Lamp, Red Light Heat Device (Portable), Near IR Cold Laser| for Muscle Pain & Pain Relief | Improves Blood Circulation | 300W, Safety-Features
product_meta.description:
Natural Pain Management and Relief using Infrared Red Light Therapy.
The Beurer Infrared Heat Lamp is designed to deliver infrared heat to the human body. It can be used to provide warming relief to those with colds, muscle aches & tension. When the infrared heat hits the targeted area, the warmth opens up the capillaries, improves the circulation & aids to naturally get rid of toxins that are inside your body, encouraging the joints, muscles & damaged tissue to heal. When your muscles are warm, they automatically relax to reduce stiffness & loosen up to help your joints & increase flexibility.
The Infrared Heat Lamp is completely non-invasive & can be used to treat a variety of body parts - such as the back, chest, shoulders, arms & legs. The size of the treatment body area covered by the IL50 is 11.8 x 15.7 inches, making it ideal for use on larger parts of the body. All treatment areas should be kept a minimum distance of 12?16 inches between the lamp and the body. The red light surface measures 6.5 x 6 inches.
The Beurer IL50 Red Light Therapy can be used as a supportive treatment of bronchial congestion. The Infrared Lamp should be facing the chest area for 10-15 minutes at a time, several times daily - for maximum results to relieve the congestion.
For joint pain & muscle aches, the red light should face the part of the body that needs to be treated, directly. It features a powerful 300w infrared ceramic plate with a large surface area of 6.5 x 6 inches and 100% UV blocker. We have designed our unit with safety features, such as active ventilation, a digital timer that can be set from 1-15 mins, & an automatic safety switch-off when the set time elapses.
SPECIFICATIONS:
Ceramic Glass Plate 
100% UV Blocker 
Digital Timer
Body Treatment Area: 11.8" x 15.7"
Red Light Surface: 6.5" x 6"
Safety Switch-Off After 15 minutes
Active Ventilation & Overheating Protection
Our customer service is right here in the USA! Feel free to give us a call at +1(800) 536-0366
feature_bullets: PORTABLE, CONVENIENT & EASY TO USE: Adjustable tilt angle for direct heating where you need it and portable with a cord winder. Start it simply by pressing the On/Off switch and choosing your time
XXL TREATMENT SURFACE: The IL 50 lamp is perfect for treating large parts of the body. For an ideal outcome we recommend a treatment area of 11.8” x 15.7”. Keep at minimum 12” – 16” distance

EFFECTIVE DEEP PENETRATION: IR light therapy provides better pain relief by penetrating even deep layers of the skin. It improves cardiovascular health (blood flow) treats inflammation and promotes cell repair
ACCESSORIES & SUPPORT INCLUDED: Comes with an AC-Adapter with a cord winder. And if you have any questions, our friendly Florida based team is always happy to help
BEURER SAFETY FEATURES: 100% UV-free, built-in timer (1-15 mins) and overheat protection; Material of the Underside: Soft, Breathable Cotton

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
